nodes.text: Sart Juloss was a Hassk criminal arrested by the New Republic and imprisoned on Selnesh, where he was serving a twenty-five year sentence for shipjacking. His profile in the New Republic prison registry was one of several that Marshal Carasynthia Dune looked at from her office on the planet Nevarro in around 9 ABY while searching for the profile of prisoner Migs Mayfeld.
Sart Juloss's profile first appeared in "Chapter 14: The Tragedy", the sixth episode of the second season of The Mandalorian, which was released on December 4, 2020.
